1.content: Research data entry job requirements and pain points
1.details: 1. Search for current data entry job postings and requirements. 2. Identify common data entry challenges. 3. Analyze automation opportunities. 4. Document findings for platform enhancement.

2.content: Identify free APIs and open source solutions for data processing
2.details: 1. Research free APIs for data validation and processing. 2. Find open source libraries for data entry automation. 3. Explore OCR, data extraction, and validation services. 4. Document integration possibilities.

3.content: Enhance the Enterprise Data Automation Platform
3.details: 1. Add new data entry templates and workflows. 2. Integrate free APIs for data validation. 3. Implement OCR capabilities for document processing. 4. Add automated data cleaning and validation features. 5. Create user-friendly forms for different job types.

4.details: 1. Test all new features with real data entry scenarios. 2. Validate API integrations work properly. 3. Ensure responsive design and user experience. 4. Deploy updated version to GitHub.
